fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: Keeping the doctors away since the dawn of medicine.

fruits.name: Bananas
fruits.description: Cramp-preventing sweetness. Sold in bunches only.

fruits.name: Pineapple
fruits.description: Known to cause arguments over pizza flavors.

fruits.name: Watermelon
fruits.description: Able to satisfy both hunger and thirst.

fruits.name: Blackberries
fruits.description: Destined to make great pies and cobblers. Sold in 250g packs.

fruits.name: Lemon
fruits.description: Popular among enterprising children who seel it in liquid form.

vegetables.name: Carrot
vegetables.description: Everyone's best know source of carotenes.

vegetables.name: Eggplant
vegetables.description: Many people don't know they can be fried and have great taste.

vegetables.name: Lettuce
vegetables.description: Green goodness. Even meat afficionados will get these to decorate their plates.

vegetables.name: Onion
vegetables.description: Will make you cry. Then, will make you smile.

vegetables.name: Broccoli
vegetables.description: The go-to option for introducing kids to the ways of healthy diets.

vegetables.name: Cauliflower
vegetables.description: Eaten rather than presented in bouquets.

dairy.name: Cow milk
dairy.description: A stable on any diet. Sold in 600 mL boxes.

dairy.name: Soy milk
dairy.description: Making people everywhere wonder whether it is milked. Sold in 500 mL boxes.

dairy.name: Sour cream
dairy.description: Cream, but after latic acid fermentation.

dairy.name: Condensed milk
dairy.description: Milk concentrated through evaporation and with sugar added until diabetics can no longer consume it.

dairy.name: Butter
dairy.description: Milk derivative with far and wide application in any kitchen.

dairy.name: Mozarella
dairy.description: A cheese that came from southern Italy to conquer the world.

dairy.name: Brie cheese
dairy.description: Named after the French region it originated from.

dairy.name: Parmesan cheese
dairy.description: A hard, granular cheese that has been aged for at least 12 months.

dairy.name: Stilton cheese
dairy.description: English cheese produced with Penicillium fungi, although there are Penicillium-free varieties.

dairy.name: Swiss cheese
dairy.description: Swiss cheeses have names, you know. This one is called Emmental.
